parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks if client has Compass enabled in [[description.ext]] (''showCompass'' param) or force enabled with [[showCompass]] command.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''shownCompass'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[shownCompass]]) [[then]] {[[hint]] "You have Compass enabled"};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[showCompass]], [[visibleCompass]], [[shownGPS]], [[shownWatch]], [[shownHUD]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.96|SHOWNCOMPASS]]

<dt class="note">[[User:POLPOX|POLPOX]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Even if you're aiming down a sight (which is usually you can't open the compass), [[shownCompass]] returns true if you press the compass key (K).
</dd>
</dl>
